column1: Her for se here from Lindesse to Hreopedune & þær wintersetl nam & þone cyning Burgræd ofer sæ adræfdon ymb xxii wintra þæs þe he rice hæfde & þæt lond all geeodon

column2: þa ridan se fyrd west æfter se here

column1: ac he hie sona forslog & gefliemde þæt hie siþþan ungemetlicne ege from him hæfdon & Thebana fæsten abræc & mid ealle towearp þætte ær wæs ealra Creca heafodstol & siþþan þæt folc eall on ellþeodge him wið feo gesealde
